title: Willoughby & The Lion
description: This is the story of Willoughby, whose new house feels too small and very lonely.It's also the story of an enchanted lion and spectacular wishes come true: of roller coasters, and fast, fast shoes, and enormous crowds of people.But most of all, it's the story of one important question: What is the most wonderful thing of all?This gorgeous picture book is a true original.
author: Greg   Foley
